name: RoboReflector
description:
My weakness is also my strength!

Instructions:
Move: WASD/Arrow
Lower Shields: Right Click & hold!

You are shielded from enemy bullets...but to absorb more power, you must lower your shields and use a tractor vortex to complete the mission: over 9000 bullets!

Credits:
Art, design, coding: @goodwincek in Godot for TriJam180. results >3 hrs
sfx: generated in sfxr.exe by DrPetter
Music: Nosoapradio.us [ http://nosoapradio.us ]
